name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.content-summary.sleep-microsec
description:
The length of time in microseconds to put the thread to sleep, between reaquiring the locks
    in content summary computation.

name: dfs.client.socketcache.capacity
description:
Socket cache capacity (in entries) for short-circuit reads.
    If this value is set to 0, the client socket cache is disabled.

name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.hard-kill-timeout-ms
description: Number of milliseconds to wait before the job client kills the application.

name: dfs.ha.log-roll.period
description:
How often, in seconds, the StandbyNode should ask the active to
    roll edit logs. Since the StandbyNode only reads from finalized
    log segments, the StandbyNode will only be as up-to-date as how
    often the logs are rolled. Note that failover triggers a log roll
    so the StandbyNode will be up to date before it becomes active.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-reset-time-period-ms
description:
The time period in milliseconds that the allocation count for each array length is
    reset to zero if there is no increment.

name: dfs.client.socket-timeout
description: Default timeout value in milliseconds for all sockets.

name: dfs.datanode.handler.count
description: The number of server threads for the datanode.
